weeklyTopNews.title: Queensland again records no new coronavirus cases but Health Minister warns testing numbers down
weeklyTopNews.summary: Queensland recorded 25 days in a row without a recorded COVID-19 case that posed a risk of community transmission.

weeklyTopNews.title: Coronavirus: Victoria reports 12 cases with three linked to Melbourne butcher
weeklyTopNews.summary: Three of the 12 new cases announced in Victoria today are linked to a butcher at Chadstone Shopping Centre. The 14-day rolling average is now 11.9.

weeklyTopNews.title: Victoria records eight new coronavirus cases and three deaths as Melbourne's average falls, police patrol beaches
weeklyTopNews.summary: A large number of people were filmed flouting social distancing rules at St Kilda beach. Victoria Premier Daniel Andrews has expressed his "disappointment" in what he described as "unacceptable" scenes.

weeklyTopNews.title: New South Wales and the Northern Territory ready to open their borders to New Zealanders
weeklyTopNews.summary: In a few weeks residents of New Zealand will be allowed to visit New South Wales and the Northern Territory without having to quarantine.

weeklyTopNews.title: Victoria records seven more coronavirus cases and two deaths as the 14-day average continues falling
weeklyTopNews.summary: Metropolitan Melbourne's 14-day new case average is now 12.8. The target for reducing restrictions on the 19th is a 14-day average of 5 or lower.
